topic.title: Hospital Admission Medications Section Entries Optional - conformance rules

section.p: The Hospital Admission Medications section defines the relevant medications administered prior to admission to the facility. The currently active medications must be listed.

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="42346-7" MEDICATIONS ON ADMISSION (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10099)

SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] admissionMedication (CONF:10102, CONF:10110)
